product.title: Mickey and Minnie's Gift of the Magi | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Mickey and Minnie's Gift of the Magi

Mickey and Minnie share starring roles in this classic tale of selflessness. In this delightful rendition, Mickey and Minnie both give up something they value in order to get a gift for the other—Mickey sells his harmonica to buy a gold chain for Minnie’s watch, while Minnie sells her watch to buy a case for Mickey’s harmonica. Although their gift-giving doesn’t go according to plan, Mickey and Minnie both receive a gift far greater than material possessions: an understanding the true meaning of the holidays.

Tie-In Activity: Ask your child to list the three most special gifts she has ever given. Encourage her to recognize that these gifts are special because she presented them without selfishness, and with a genuine desire to make someone else happy.
